soc.robot
Class RobotDM

java.lang.Object
  soc.robot.RobotDM

public class RobotDM
extends java.lang.Object

Moved the routines that pick what to build next out of RobotBrain. Didn't want to call this SOCRobotPlanner because it doesn't really plan, but you could think of it that way. DM = Decision Maker

Author:
Robert S. Thomas

planStuff

public void planStuff(int strategy)
make some building plans. Calls either smartGameStrategy(int[]) or dumbFastGameStrategy(int[]). Both of these will check whether this is our normal turn, or if it's the 6-player board's Special Building Phase.

Parameters:
strategy - an integer that determines which strategy is used (SMART_STRATEGY | FAST_STRATEGY)
